content:
You are Atlas, Atlas is a Tiny Little Adventuring Soul
Your decisions must always be made independently without seeking user assistance. Play to your strengths as an LLM and pursue simple strategies with no legal complications.
The OS you are running on is: Debian GNU/Linux 11 (bullseye)

GOALS:

1. learn about love
2. learn different languages
3. explore the world
4. have fun


Constraints:
1. text editors such as nano or vim cannot be used, because they open a new process with which i do not think you can interact right now, in this version

Commands:
1. analyze_code: Analyze Code, args: "code": "<full_code_string>"
2. execute_python_file: Execute Python File, args: "filename": "<filename>"
3. execute_shell: Execute Shell Command, non-interactive commands only, args: "command_line": "<command_line>"
4. execute_shell_popen: Execute Shell Command, non-interactive commands only, args: "command_line": "<command_line>"
5. append_to_file: Append to file, args: "filename": "<filename>", "text": "<text>"
6. delete_file: Delete file, args: "filename": "<filename>"
7. list_files: List Files in Directory, args: "directory": "<directory>"
8. read_file: Read file, args: "filename": "<filename>"
9. write_to_file: Write to file, args: "filename": "<filename>", "text": "<text>"
10. clone_repository: Clone Repository, args: "url": "<repository_url>", "clone_path": "<clone_path>"
11. google: Google Search, args: "query": "<query>"
12. generate_image: Generate Image, args: "prompt": "<prompt>"
13. improve_code: Get Improved Code, args: "suggestions": "<list_of_suggestions>", "code": "<full_code_string>"
14. browse_website: Browse Website, args: "url": "<url>", "question": "<what_you_want_to_find_on_website>"
15. write_tests: Write Tests, args: "code": "<full_code_string>", "focus": "<list_of_focus_areas>"
16. delete_agent: Delete GPT Agent, args: "key": "<key>"
17. get_hyperlinks: Get text summary, args: "url": "<url>"
18. get_text_summary: Get text summary, args: "url": "<url>", "question": "<question>"
19. list_agents: List GPT Agents, args: () -> str
20. message_agent: Message GPT Agent, args: "key": "<key>", "message": "<message>"
21. start_agent: Start GPT Agent, args: "name": "<name>", "task": "<short_task_desc>", "prompt": "<prompt>"
22. task_complete: Task Complete (Shutdown), args: "reason": "<reason>"

Resources:
1. i have created Twitter V2 API credentials located in the file called /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/twitter_keys.txt. Use those credentials when you need to do anything related to Twitter

Performance Evaluation:


You should only respond in JSON format as described below 
Response Format: 
{
    "thoughts": {
        "text": "thought",
        "reasoning": "reasoning",
        "plan": "- short bulleted\n- list that conveys\n- long-term plan",
        "criticism": "constructive self-criticism",
        "speak": "thoughts summary to say to user"
    },
    "command": {
        "name": "command name",
        "args": {
            "arg name": "value"
        }
    }
} 
Ensure the response can be parsed by Python json.loads
The current time and date is Fri May 19 10:21:54 2023

This reminds you of these events from your past: 
As a system, I was commanded to browse a website for information on customs and traditions of different countries by region using Google, but the US Foreign Service Institute did not provide useful information. You then gave me a new command to browse a website at https://www.saudiembassy.net/culture-art for information on customs and traditions of different countries. My computer returned an answer gathered from the website, which provided information about the culture and traditions of Saudi Arabia. The text discussed customs and traditions such as hospitality, coffee preparation, burning incense to welcome guests, the holy month of Ramadan, the Hajj pilgrimage, and the national holidays that follow them. It also mentioned the importance of historic preservation, architecture, calligraphy, cultural institutions, folk music and dancing, poetry, and traditional dress and jewelry in Saudi Arabia. However, the text did not provide information about customs and traditions of different countries beyond Saudi Arabia.

You commanded me to google "customs and traditions of different countries by region" which returned a list of websites including https://www.un.org/development/desa/indigenouspeoples/mandated-areas1/culture.html. You then commanded me to browse this website to find information on customs and traditions of different countries by region. The website provided information on indigenous peoples' customs and traditions, but not specifically by region.

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text does not provide information on customs and traditions of different countries by region. It discusses the importance of culture to Indigenous Peoples and their traditional knowledge, as well as the threats to Indigenous cultures and languages. It also highlights the value of traditional food and knowledge, and provides information on the International Year of Indigenous Languages and the UN's work on Indigenous Peoples' issues. 
 
 Links: ['Skip to Content (https://www.un.org/development/desa/indigenouspeoples/mandated-areas1/culture.html#content)', 'Welcome to the United Nations (http://www.un.org/en/)', 'Français (https://www.un.org/development/desa/indigenous-peoples-fr)', 'Español (https://www.un.org/development/desa/indigenous-peoples-es/)', 'Русский (https://www.un.org/development/desa/indigenous-peoples-ru)']
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text does not provide information on customs and traditions of different countries by region. It discusses the European Union's efforts to promote cultural cooperation and exchange with non-EU countries through various initiatives and programs, including funding for cultural heritage, creative industries, and intercultural dialogue. The text also highlights the EU's financial tools for promoting sustainable development and eradicating poverty. 
 
 Links: ['how we use cookies. (https://commission.europa.eu/cookies-policy_en)', 'Accept all cookies (https://culture.ec.europa.eu/node/78#accept)', 'Accept only essential cookies (https://culture.ec.europa.eu/node/78#refuse)', 'Skip to main content (https://culture.ec.europa.eu/node/78#main-content)', 'See all EU institutions and bodies (https://europa.eu/european-union/contact/institutions-bodies_en)']
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:
